name: Google - + - Plus
description:
Google - + - Plus

The Top Bar, Left Side Bar And The Right Chat.
Are Hidden.

And Will Reappear If You Go With The Mouse On The Edge Of The Window
additional_info: Changelog: Version. 5.3 + Added Communities + Bug Fixes I have a dynamic effect installed so that the window in the middle of the screen customize the space left is about 6cm and 12cm right. I myself have a resolution of 1920x1080 pixels. accordingly I do not know if it fits with the other resolutions. I would appreciate a picture from there or is a message from you. to fix the errors! Thanks for the 1000+ installations! You Like My Work? You Appreciate My Work? Buy Me A Beer! Or Donate With Paypal :) If You Found An Error. Please Let Me Know So I Can Fix It SORRY For The Bad English More Styles: Chip - Facebook - Google - Accounts Google - Alerts Google - Blogger Google - Books Google - Calendar Google - Code Google - Drive Google - Groups Google - Mail Google - Maps Google - News Google - Picasa Google - Play Google - Reader Google - Scholar Google - Search Google - Shopping Google - Sketchup Google - Talk Google - Translate Google - Youtube Twitter - Userstyles -
